mapper.select: SELECT SONG_IMAGE_PATH_NAME, SONG_TITLE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, GENRE_NAME, MOOD_NAME, SONG_LICENSE FROM SONG LEFT JOIN SONG_IMAGE USING (SONG_IMAGE_NO) LEFT JOIN SONG_IMAGE_PATH USING (SONG_IMAGE_PATH_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER ON (SONG_MEMBER_NO = MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN DOWNLOAD_COUNT ON (SONG_NO = DOWNLOAD_COUNT_SONG_NO) LEFT JOIN MOOD ON (MOOD_NO = SONG_MOOD_NO) LEFT JOIN GENRE ON (GENRE_NO = SONG_GENRE_NO) WHERE SONG_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY DOWNLOAD_COUNT_NUMBER DESC
